mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product ( CATEGORY_ID, PRODUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_PRICE, PRODUCT_STOCK, PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION, PRODUCT_DISCOUNT, PRODUCT_SALE_STATUS ) VALUES ( #{categoryId}, #{productName}, #{productPrice}, #{productStock}, #{productDescription}, #{productDiscount}, #{productSaleStatus} )
mapper.update: UPDATE product SET CATEGORY_ID = #{categoryId}, PRODUCT_NAME = #{productName}, PRODUCT_PRICE = #{productPrice}, PRODUCT_STOCK = #{productStock}, PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION = #{productDescription}, PRODUCT_DISCOUNT = #{productDiscount}, PRODUCT_SALE_STATUS = #{productSaleStatus} WHERE PRODUCT_ID = #{productId}
mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM product
AND PRODUCT_SALE_STATUS = #{status}
AND CATEGORY_ID = (SELECT CATEGORY_ID FROM category WHERE CATEGORY_NAME = #{category})
AND PRODUCT_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchCond}, '%')

SELECT p.PRODUCT_ID, p.CATEGORY_ID, p.PRODUCT_NAME, p.PRODUCT_PRICE, p.PRODUCT_DISCOUNT, i1.IMAGE_URL, i1.IMAGE_ID, IF(l.LIKE_ID IS NOT NULL, 1, 0) AS liked FROM product p JOIN image i1 ON i1.PRODUCT_ID = p.PRODUCT_ID LEFT JOIN likes l ON l.PRODUCT_ID = p.PRODUCT_ID
AND p.CATEGORY_ID = (SELECT CATEGORY_ID FROM category WHERE CATEGORY_NAME = #{category})
AND p.PRODUCT_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchCond}, '%')
AND p.PRODUCT_SALE_STATUS = '판매중'
AND i1.IMAGE_ID = ( SELECT MIN(i2.IMAGE_ID) FROM image i2 WHERE i2.PRODUCT_ID = p.PRODUCT_ID )
ORDER BY p.PRODUCT_ID DESC;

SELECT p.PRODUCT_NAME, p.PRODUCT_PRICE, p.PRODUCT_DISCOUNT, p.PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION, p.PRODUCT_STOCK, i1.IMAGE_URL, i1.IMAGE_ID FROM product p JOIN image i1 ON i1.PRODUCT_ID = p.PRODUCT_ID WHERE p.PRODUCT_ID = #{productId} AND i1.IMAGE_ID = ( SELECT MIN(i2.IMAGE_ID) FROM image i2 WHERE i2.PRODUCT_ID = p.PRODUCT_ID )
